name: Mister Slider
description:
A SIMPLE PUZZLE GAME :

Play as "Mister Slider" a square that loves to slide.

Guide him through several levels with different types of obstacles and try to reach the finish.

We will have to think about how to move Mister Slider properly because once launched in one direction he will only stop when he meets an obstacle.

NOTE :

This game is intended for mobile use. 

This version is just for the curious here who want to try, otherwise the game are also free on Googleplay.

( You can use "Enter" to toggle "full screen" )
